title: Legacy Vault
body:
Does anybody know if The Legacy Vault will be opened ever again? Cuz now we can get legacy skins from hextech.. I would rly like to have Road Warrior MF. I loved when Riot opened the Vault... is it going back? If it is, when? And if not, why?
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: I had a quick look at the wiki page about [Legacy Skins](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Champion_skin/Retired_skins) and it looks like _some_ legacy skins come back in a special sale each year but not all of them. Eleven months ago [Battle Boss Blitzcrank sends skins into hiding!](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/battle-boss-blitzcrank-sends-skins-hiding) brought back 21 legacy skins so another special sale might be soon.
